text: Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.
Do not judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
It was the possibility of darkness that made the day seem so bright.
Even five minutes of your time can make someone's day.
In all of your living, don't forget to live.
I look upon every day to be lost in which I do not make a new acquaintance.
Man can destroy a mountain within a day, but a Man cannot build a mountain in a single day or the rest of his days.
